channel.title: CVE Feed for CridioStudio -- ListingPro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CridioStudio -- ListingPro

item.title: CVE-2024-39621|2024-08-02T15:04:07.329Z -- cridiostudio -- listingpro
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in CridioStudio ListingPro allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects ListingPro: from n/a through 2.9.3.
